content.content: How should we deal with EIP3091 when it comes to L2’s? Block is not used anymore and replaced with batch. IMHO we should create a new standard without block (and maybe token) - as far as I see only tx and address are really used in the wild anyway. Or has anyone seen usages of block and token in the wild?
content.GPT-summary: The author is proposing a new standard for EIP3091 and is asking for feedback on how to deal with it in L2's. They suggest creating a new standard without block and token, as they believe only tx and address are commonly used. They are open to constructive criticism and feedback on their proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback
